author: PATRICK SERRATO

review: I love the Apple TV and the simplicity of it.  Makes streaming and playing podcasts and iTunes music simple.  For less than $100 it is SO worth it.Four stars because clicking Airplay on my Macbook Air and iMac often does not work (or sound does not play).  I checked, double checked, triple checked all settings. My Apple computers are less than two years old each.  After searching a solution, I downloaded AirParrot  (about $10) after reading about others having the same issue, and it works perfectly.So really, total cost is $110  (as you may need to download AirParrot or something similar) - still very worth it.

review: I was looking for something to mirror my iPad 2 with my tv. A friend suggested Apple TV and I took his advice. I don't regret it. I can now enjoy my iPad flics on TV. author: Dimitrios Siountris

review: Not sure how Apple has packed so much into such a small and affordable device. We've had 1st and 2nd generation AppleTV the 2nd gen has no internal hd and uses a ton less energy. I being the tech geek of the house had my doubts about being completely reliant on streaming which the 2nd and 3rd generation Atv's are. Over the past 2yrs Apple has made major improvements to the iOS and many services (streaming) make the device a great value. In the early days I did feel crippled by the lack of options but that is no longer an issue for example MLB network is now available if you have an MLB account. And then there are the obvious options like Netflix and streaming from your networked computers (that are running iTunes). My guess is things will only get better as Apple continues to add services through iCloud and hopefully streaming of live TV. Even without those the device is a bargain and completely idiot proof. :-)Note you can stream many cable channels via iPad - iPhone - iPod apps in HD. For example we often stream news channels like CNN to our Apple TV on our bedroom TV via my iPhone. However most apps require you have a TV provider... We have Dish sat service (only one receiver in our family room) having that account lets us use apps like CNN to watch their live streaming.Bottom line this is a great device and even greater if you have iDevices in your home. A great value.
